t9AdH69G27SmLdVhr.name: Choose a 15 Point Motivation and delete this

tiDpzJzFZ-QKUYQXE.name: Delusion (Every strange occurence has a supernatural explanation)

trWFkFnURzQ2jUId9.name: Post-Combat Shakes
trWFkFnURzQ2jUId9.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

tfuDlrhc5JxtCDqLn.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a pass using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.
tfuDlrhc5JxtCDqLn.name: Lecherousness

features.situation: from others

t5ALSnbBpH1cuqLeW.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the need to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!
t5ALSnbBpH1cuqLeW.name: Honesty

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

tY9wtuXzKXv2bbz5d.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!
tY9wtuXzKXv2bbz5d.name: Overconfidence

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

tQiuLouDgp8ek9h6y.name: Selfish
tQiuLouDgp8ek9h6y.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or snub. On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

tYPSPUZ2qFL0au4Uh.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation
tYPSPUZ2qFL0au4Uh.name: Curious

tR5xF54z0F4OOgw2X.name: Trickster
tR5xF54z0F4OOgw2X.notes: Make a self-control roll each day. If you fail, you must try to trick a dangerous subject: a skilled warrior, a dangerous monster, a whole group of reasonably competent opponents, etc. If you resist, you get a cumulative -1 per day to your self-control roll until you finally fail a roll!

tUze7Ro_sdWnGFPOv.notes: Make a self-control roll each morning upon awakening. If you fail, you suffered nightmares; this costs you 1 FP that you can only recover through sleep. On a roll of 17 or 18, you are left shaking, and are at -1 to all skill and Perception rolls for the entire day.
tUze7Ro_sdWnGFPOv.name: Nightmares

tavi32lvO-RwXbPE1.name: Loner
tavi32lvO-RwXbPE1.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: to others
to IQ-based skills when alone, or only -1 if in a group of 4 or less
from others
toward any stranger and any legitimate reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tPEcT3WSjPmmUa6YM.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered  as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.
tPEcT3WSjPmmUa6YM.name: Greed

features.situation: to others
to IQ-based skills when alone

tdCaSfDJhbhJrqqky.name: Flashbacks

mJfaZpFtR-n1Hmc8I.name: Severe

mXmiPzId88tfAAFuX.name: Mild

mvRRl9ljAskHQTrDy.name: Crippling
mvRRl9ljAskHQTrDy.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use

tdCaSfDJhbhJrqqky.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.
